Negative_Review: Room service let us down I am sorry to say burger ordered asked for well done arrived still mooing sent back 2nd attempt same burger still raw with cold fries Taken off bill kindly
Positive_Review: Super location and staff Great bar and super tasty bar snacks

I used to go clubbing at Les Bains back when it was only a club and one of the trendiest in Paris So I was super excited to explore the new design and VIP feeling of staying there The location cannot be beat if you like walking around old and trendy Paris Staff was nice and responsive The clear disappointement for me was the size of the Classic Room and the price I paid for it The room was so small that my partner and I could not get around the hallway at the same time I constantly knocked my knees when going to the toilet which was in the middle of the bathroom Also you ll need earplugs if you re staying on a weekend as the room overlooks the courtyard where people drink and music plays Just didn t feel the price was justified but it was a good once in a time experience

Negative_Review: Hotel location is not ideal for Paris unless you plan to stay in the area
Positive_Review: Great place professionaly managed Room was prepared earlier as we arrived before noon so thanks for that

Negative_Review: An all day breakfast menu would have been perfect Amazing pancakes
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful and genuinely wanted me to have a good stay and enjoy my time very hospitable Enjoyed chilling by the balcony that overlooks the courtyard as the weather was really nice There was a nice little couch and a coffee table on the corner of my standard room something you don t really expect in a standard room in Pairs it was very nice to hangout with friends in that tiny little corner that somehow fit us all Writing this review makes me want to go back

Negative_Review: The parfum spread in the hallway was too penetrating
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was ideal for visiting Paris Comfortable room with the necessary luxuries

Negative_Review: Meal in the Salle a manger was just ok I suppose i maybe expected better
Positive_Review: Great beds amazing bathroom and quality cosmetics Friendly and knowledgeable bar staff and good restaurant recommendations from reception

Negative_Review: Bar closed a little early one night 1230 club downstairs wasn t open wed thurs Breakfast not included
Positive_Review: New gorgeous room UNREAL cocktails Good young cool vibe Great design Smells nice

Negative_Review: Some staff were slow and unfriendly at times Security was unfriendly and almost didn t let us in to the hotel Concierge was helpful but was unclear or unresponsive to enquiries At 500 euros night it was not worth it
Positive_Review: Absolutely spotless room beautiful building great design

Negative_Review: There is a club on the premises and it is LOUD It was so bad that I put on a white noise app to drown out the sound and it still didn t work
Positive_Review: Location is great Room amenities are great Beautifully designed and very chic

Negative_Review: The restaurant is not great I had very over cooked cod
Positive_Review: Fabulous looking place great staff with no attitude a rarity in a fashionable hotel The Rooms are lovely and the shower was amazing

Negative_Review: The room was way too small No closet no dresser no desk and no room for suitcases The bathroom was very dark super small without a place to hang wet towels The fire alarm went off for 15mins Thursday night at 4am in the morning with no explanation from the staff we didn t know if the hotel was on fire Given the high expense I d stay somewhere else next time in Paris
Positive_Review: The hotel is very pretty trendy The room was very high design As is the staff attractive cute and all very helpful Location was good

Negative_Review: The layout of the rooms can be a bit confusion but hey it s a retrofit
Positive_Review: Very comfortable and chic hotel with a good bar atmosphere and friendly and attractive staff After so many standard format boutique hotels this one reinvents the formula and reminds me of why the genre is fun

Negative_Review: House keeping was too late and slow
Positive_Review: No Positive
